text: Supermanoela is a Brazilian telenovela produced and broadcast by Rede Globo. It premiered on 21 January 1974 and ended on 5 June 1974, with a total of 137 episodes. It is the thirteenth "novela das sete" to be aired at the timeslot. It was created by Walther Negrão and directed by Gonzaga Blota.Supermanoela - TeledramaturgiaSupermanoela trama == Cast == {|class="wikitable sortable" |- style="background:#ccc;" ! Actor !!
